issue.title: Support Dictionary Unification with Concatenate
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9150](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9150). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Seems to be supported through arrow to pandas conversions at the moment. I **believe** the DictionaryUnifier could be leveraged for this.

Not sure if there are unintended consequences, but the NYI implies that this is desired. Didn't see an open issue for it already.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9150?focusedCommentId=17138160) by Joris Van den Bossche (jorisvandenbossche):*
Is this similar to ARROW-5336 ?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9150?focusedCommentId=17138462) by Daniel Nugent (nugend):*
Yes, looks like. Sorry, I think I searched for "concat" rather than "concatenate" when looking for an existing issue.
